Name: Suzana Binte Sharif
Memory: I got countless memories with her. It's hard to pick one even so the journey we had while going school or batch by public transport,  mini picnic on her rooftop, Rajjak sir's batch will always hold a special part in my heart. Honestly every moment was so magical and full of enjoyment with her at that time.
